author: Anthony King
title: ‘When I look at the viral loads we find in elderly people, it is mind boggling’
description: Prodigious virus numbers in Covid-19 linked to contagion, say experts
content:
The Covid-19 virus is incredibly aggressive and spectacularly contagious, according to leading coronavirus scientists. 
Virus numbers are three times what might be found with other respiratory viruses such as flu, including in older patients, who are more co… [+4438 chars]
